live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve it. Thank you for your patience.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
48113.summary: Some customers in the Kitsilano area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
48113.title: Mar 29 - Vancouver (Kitsilano) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
